pages.text: The $(item)Advanced Liquid Compressor/$ is the $(l:base_concepts/pressure_tiers)tier 2/$ version of the $(l:compressors/liquid_compressor)Liquid Compressor/$, with a maximum safe pressure of 20 bar. It generates a base 50mL air/tick, and can be upgraded with $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#speed)Speed Upgrades/$.$(p)However, this generator must be $(l:base_concepts/heat)cooled/$, as its efficiency will drop as the temperature rises, up to the point where no air is generated at all.
